title: IOGEAR SuperSpeed USB 3.0 4-Port Hub (GUH374)
description: Your SuperSpeed USB 3.0 4-Port Hub is here. IOGEAR's SuperSpeed USB 3.0 4-Port Hub provides 4 SuperSpeed USB 3.0 ports for your super-speed connectivity needs. The plug-n-play, hot swappable hub allows you to connect up to 4 USB 3.0 devices to your computer. Transfer data at up to 5 Gbps, that's fast. The GUH374 from IOGEAR is also backwards compatible with devices that are under USB 2.0 and USB 1.1 specifications. Device must be plugged into a USB 3.0 port in order to achieve super-speed rates. Features ; 4 SuperSpeed USB 3.0 ports for easy expansion and super-fast connectivity; SuperSpeed USB 3.0 data transfer rate up to5 Gbps; Up to 10x faster than USB 2.0; Backwards compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.1; Sleek, compact design will accommodate any workstation and is easily portable; Hot swappable: connect/disconnect devices without shutting down computer; Plug-n-Play
